tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ResearcherData (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dataset_name VARCHAR(255),
  data_points INT,
  mean FLOAT,
  median FLOAT,
  mode INT,
  variance FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE dataset (id INT, value FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE descriptive_stats (id INT, mean FLOAT, median FLOAT, mode INT, std_dev FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE data_distribution (id INT, data_point FLOAT)

Create Table researcher_research_projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    dataset_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

Create Table dataset_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_id INT,
    data_point FLOAT,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_category VARCHAR(50),
    data_time TIMESTAMP
);

Create Table researcher_statistics (
    statistic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    statistic_name VARCHAR(100),
    statistic_value FLOAT,
    calculation_date DATE,
    result_description TEXT
);

Create Table dataset_labels (
    label_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_id INT,
    label_name VARCHAR(50),
    label_description TEXT,
    label_color VARCHAR(10)
);
